description:
* Based on The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, The Marvelous Land of Oz, Ozma of Oz, and The Emerald City of Oz by http://anidb.net/cr10265 [Lyman Frank Baum].
Off to see the marvelous land of Oz!
Dorothy and her canine pal Toto live a quiet life on a Kansas farm with Uncle Henry and Aunt Em. But one day, the little girl and her dog find themselves spirited away from the fields of Kansas, to the magical land of Oz! Dorothy and Toto meet many friends on the yellow-brick road to Emerald City, where she hopes to find a way home to Kansas-- but when she arrives, the city`s mysterious ruler, the Wizard of Oz, is not what she expects!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy lives with her Aunt and Uncle on their farm, but one day she is swept away by a tornado to another world.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy learns a little about the Land of Oz and is set on the path to meet the Wizard in the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Scarecrow joins Dorothy on her journey, in hopes of getting a brain. Along the way, they meet a tin woodcutter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Setting Off on a Wishful Journey

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy and her new companions continue along the Yellow Brick Road, but many obstacles await them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour la cité d`émeraudes

REGULAR.description:
The river carries Dorothy and her friends away from the Yellow Brick Road, where they run into more trouble in a poppy field.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La reine des souris des champs

REGULAR.description:
As the group closes in on their destination, and after a little help from the Witch of the North, they finally meet the Wizard.
Source: crunchyroll

The Wizard isn`t quite what Dorothy expected, and is requesting assistance from her and her friends before he grants their wishes.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and her friends encounter new obstacles and dangers as they approach the home of the Wicked Witch of the West.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has been captured by the Wicked Witch of the West, who plans to use the Ruby Slippers to conquer Oz.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and Lion have a confrontation with the Witch, and they begin searching for their missing friends.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has defeated the Wicked Witch of the West, but there are new dangers and friends on the horizon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mombi, Tip et la coiffe d`or

REGULAR.description:
Tin Man gets asked to stay and rule the Winkies, and the group heads off to tell the Wizard of their success.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De retour à la cité d`émeraudes

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy and her friends return to the Emerald City, excited to receive their rewards. The Wizard refuses, and his true nature is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

Lion, Tin Man and Scarecrow go to the Wizard to receive their gifts. Dorothy, however, remains stuck in Oz.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bonne volonté du faux magicien

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy has been left behind in Oz, but heads off to the south to see Glinda the Good Witch, in hopes of getting home.
Source: crunchyroll

The journey to Glinda`s palace has been filled with obstacles, including a detour to the Glass Village.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has arrived at Glinda`s Palace. The magic of the ruby slippers is revealed, and Dorothy goes home.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has returned home, to her Aunt and Uncle. They`re having a difficult time believing her tales of Oz.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy`s missing shoe turns up, which she uses to return to Oz. She runs into a familiar face and might have a way home.
Source: crunchyroll

Mombi is planning to turn Dorothy and Tip into statues, so they escape in the night trying to reach the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and her new friends continue to flee from Mombi, but they meet a woman along the way who plans to attack the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and Tip run to warn Scarecrow about General Ginjur, meanwhile Mombi catches up and arrives at the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fuite de la cité d`émeraudes

REGULAR.description:
Ginjur and Mombi make a deal to hunt down Dorothy and her friends, but they arrive in the West and Tin Man offers to help them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le bûcheron vient à la rescousse

REGULAR.description:
Mombi has trapped the gang in a field on sunflowers, but Gingur disrupts her spell and they press on toward the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has been captured by Mombi and Gingur, but she and her friends have a secret weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

The gang`s escape plan has stalled, but the Wizard`s tricks help buy them some time.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and her friends have been split up after their encounter with the dragon. After reuniting, they arrive at Glinda`s castle.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingur and Mombi hatch a plan to attack Glinda, but Glinda arrives at the Emerald City before they can march.
Source: crunchyroll

With Scarecrow back in his position as King, Mombi and Gingur try to leave, but are stopped by the citizens of the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Mombi refuses to talk about Ozma, but Glinda returns to help find the truth, and question Mombi.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has returned home to Kansas, but her adventures in Oz are far from over. A spell calls her back, where she meets a clockwork man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドロシーとチックタック

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy and Tik Tok are off to see Princess Lulu, a mysterious ruler who is obsessed with hats.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and her friends have been reunited, and they are off to find the Nome King. A desert stands between them and Nome Land, with many obstacles.
Source: crunchyroll

The gang has taken refuge in a wrecked ship, and finds a talking hen that has made it her home. Luckily, she knows the way to Nome Land.
Source: crunchyroll

Travelling across a rocky land, the gang encounters more obstacles, including windy caves and giants made of stone.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and the gang have finally found Nome Land, deep underground. The Nome King sets up a contest for them to win the Prince back.
Source: crunchyroll

The Nome King details the rules of his contest, and Lion and Tin Man decide to test their luck.
Source: crunchyroll

Scarecrow takes his turn to find the Prince, but Lord Calico is full of tricks and lays a trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dorothée gagne au jeu de roi

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy has succeeded and freed her friends and the Prince, but escaping from the underground palace may be more difficult than it seems.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le secret de la peur des Nomes

REGULAR.description:
The Nome King sets his army to trapping Dorothy and her friends, and the gang has to navigate a series of devious traps.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le roi des Nomes tend un piège

REGULAR.description:
Moving closer to the surface, it seems like there`s hope that the gang will escape, but the Nome King isn`t done with them yet.
Source: crunchyroll

The Nome King has become obsessed with Dorothy and Oz, meanwhile Princess Ozma has gone missing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le roi des Nomes prépare sa revanche

REGULAR.description:
Dorothy is trying to teach Ozma how to be Queen, but Oz has bigger problems on the horizon. The Nomes are on the march.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le secret de la princesse d`Ozma
The Secret of the Emerald City

REGULAR.description:
Ozma has discovered her past, and her magic, which she uses to transport herself and Dorothy to Paper Land.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チョッキンペットの国

REGULAR.description:
Ozma continues to practice her magic with Dorothy, and the Nome King`s army digs closer to the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Harvest in the Land of Oz
Le monstre grognon se joint aux Nomes

REGULAR.description:
The Growleywog is at the front of the Nome invasion, and Guff plots against his own people. Ozma rehearses for her coronation.
Source: crunchyroll

The Nomes have reached the Land of the Winkies, and the Growleywog gets a chance to eat. Dorothy leaves Oz to go check on Tin Man.
Source: crunchyroll

The Nome King has been delayed by an iron wall, but he`s still a threat to Oz. Dorothy arrives to help Tin Man with the Growleywog.
Source: crunchyroll

Guff has infiltrated the Emerald City and drank the Water of Oblivion. Ozma goes to confront the Growleywog.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy has a nightmare about her home in Kansas. While she`s sleeping, the Nomes and the Growleywog have invaded the Emerald City.
Source: crunchyroll

Dorothy and Scarecrow hatch a plan to send the Nomes running, but the Growleywog is a tougher foe to be rid of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dorothée et ses amis défendent le palais

REGULAR.description:
The Nome king may have defeated Dorothy and the Scarecrow! Who will be able to save the people of Emerald City?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tout est bien qui finit bien

OTHER.description: Episodes 1-17 re-edited into a movie format
Episodes 42 to 52 re-edited into a movie format

WIKIPEDIA_JP: オズの魔法使い_(テレビアニメ)

titles.title: Im Land des Zauberers von Oz
